title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Have the Second Try
content:
努力学习中！这里是雨沫，在bosong老师的指导下正在努力学习使用hexo在github上搭建自己的blog今天的进度：完成了blog的搭建进行了主题的修改发布了第一篇（上一篇）以及第二篇（这一篇）博客
Love the life you live, live the life you love.

title: First BLOG of Yu_MO
content: Frist try(maybe?)Well,so…this is my first blog(such a long and tough time to make itbut… it’s worthwhile, isn’t it?
